title: Eric Zemmour Is No Donald Trump
sub_head: The French far-right candidate is presenting his vision in a manner that is attuned to the French elite.
body:
Long before Eric Zemmour announced his candidacy for president of France, English-language publications were comparing him to Donald Trump: a provocateur on the far right with hard-line views on immigration; a well-known TV personality with no previous governing experience, whose success in the polls surprised established politicians.
The comparison is convenient but facile. Messrs. Zemmour and Trump emerged from different political traditions and appeal to very different sensibilities.
